body.name: Toddler Utensils, 6 Pack kids Silverware Set with Silicone Handle, 18/8 Stainless Steel Children Safe Forks and Spoons, Dishwasher Safe
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: Utensils set: each toddler cutlery set includes 3 forks and 3 spoons, designed for toddlers learning to self-feed, 3 fun colors are sure to attract toddlers' interest in eating and using cutlery.

Independent Feeding: Rounded toddler forks and spoons have no sharp edges, thick easy-to-grip silicone non-slip handles that are just the right size for your child's small hands, and the cutlery is sized to hold just the right amount of food for small mouths, making it easy for your child to feed themselves.

Safe and Reliable: The spoons has rounded edges, a narrow tip, and a protective barrier between the handle and the tip to prevent the cutlery from entering your child's mouth excessively, making it more comfortable and safe for your child to use and handle.
High Quality Materials: This toddler spoons and forks set is made entirely of 18/8 stainless steel and food-grade silicone, BPA-free, durable, easy to clean, dishwasher-safe and boil-safe.
Lifetime Guarantee: If you are not satisfied with our Eascrozn kids utensils, we will replace or refund for free!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Starter Set for Little Ones!
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased this baby silverware set for my little one, and I couldn’t be happier with the quality and design. The utensils are just the right size for tiny hands, and the rounded edges ensure safety during those early self-feeding attempts.The stainless steel construction is durable and easy to clean, making mealtime a breeze. The cute, gender-neutral design adds a delightful touch, and the handles have a comfortable grip for little fingers.Overall, this baby silverware set exceeded my expectations, providing a safe and enjoyable dining experience for my little munchkin. Highly recommended for parents looking for a reliable and adorable starter set!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing quality great price!
reviews.reviewText: These are amazing utensils for your toddler when they start out using them. The price you pay for 3 forks & 3 spoons is really good pricing I was honestly amazed with the quality of them. They are super nice and perfect for a toddler my son is 18 months and they are super easy for him to use and very durable.If I need more I'll definitely be purchasing these ones again.10/10 recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My toddler loves these and so do I, not heavy like our traditional forks but not as flimsy as other silicone options which has made it a great transition utensil. I love that the handle is a good size and easy for him to hold even once his hands get dirty. Also a huge bonus they are easy to clean and I can be confident in the sterilization process.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars very cute and good quality
reviews.reviewText: very good quality/ easy to use for toddler too! my kids love using them

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These are great!
reviews.reviewText: These spoons were perfect! My toddler loves them. They fit her hands so perfectly. Now that she uses these she always requests “spoon” and won’t eat without her special spoon. They have been in the dishwasher multiple times and have held up great. Everytime I have a guest come over who has children they always ask where I purchased these from. Great product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Awesome, but handles are a little wobbly
reviews.reviewText: Great product but they need a bit more sturdiness all the way to the end of the handles. Otherwise perfect size for our 2yo.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars perfect for toddlers
reviews.reviewText: they are dishwasher, safe and super easy to clean and light weight

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best choice in toddler silverware
reviews.reviewText: Seriously, not all "toddler ware" is created equally. This set is above the rest. The prongs are actually sharp enough to spear food, while at the same time being totally safe for my almost two-year-old. The silicone body is grippy even when eating slippery food like avocado.
